QuestData.Title: Hail, Commander!
QuestData.Description: Captain $n!$B$B<Taskmaster Varkule salutes you.>$B$BOverlord Mor'ghor has asked to see you in his chambers at once!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Overlord Mor'ghor at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Lord Illidan himself has asked that I promote you to the rank of commander! This is unprecedented. You will be the first Dragonmaw to reach such a rank outside of the Black Temple.
